name: Command & Conquer: Tiberium Alliances
description:
Command & Conquer: Tiberium Alliances is a strategy massively multiplayer game developed by Electronic Arts Phenomic. It came out on 20-07-2012. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Command & Conquer: Tiberium Alliances is available on PC and Web.
